verses.text: Do ye indeed \w in|strong="H1732"\w* silence speak righteousness? Do ye judge uprightly, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* ye sons \w of|strong="H4387"\w* men?

Nay, \w in|strong="H1696"\w* heart \w ye|strong="H1696"\w* work wickedness; \w Ye|strong="H1696"\w* weigh \w out|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* violence \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H8199"\w* hands \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* earth.

\w The|strong="H3027"\w* \w wicked|strong="H5766"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* estranged \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* womb: \w They|strong="H3027"\w* go astray \w as|strong="H3027"\w* soon \w as|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* born, speaking lies.

\w Their|strong="H7563"\w* poison \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w like|strong="H8582"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* poison \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* serpent: \add They are\add* \w like|strong="H8582"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* deaf adder \w that|strong="H8582"\w* stoppeth her ear,
\w Which|strong="H1823"\w* hearkeneth not \w to|strong="H2534"\w* \w the|strong="H3644"\w* voice \w of|strong="H2534"\w* charmers, Charming never \w so|strong="H3644"\w* wisely.

Break \w their|strong="H8085"\w* teeth, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* mouth: Break \w out|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* great teeth \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* young lions, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H3068"\w* melt away \w as|strong="H3068"\w* water \w that|strong="H3068"\w* runneth apace: \w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* aimeth \w his|strong="H3068"\w* arrows, let \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* though \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H6310"\w* cut off.

\add Let them be\add* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* snail \w which|strong="H4325"\w* melteth \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w passeth|strong="H1980"\w* \w away|strong="H1980"\w*, \add Like\add* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* untimely birth \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman, \w that|strong="H4325"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3988"\w* seen \w the|strong="H1980"\w* sun.

\w Before|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H2372"\w* pots \w can|strong="H1980"\w* feel \w the|strong="H1980"\w* thorns, \w He|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H8121"\w* \w take|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H8121"\w* \w away|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* whirlwind, \w the|strong="H1980"\w* green \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w burning|strong="H1980"\w* \w alike|strong="H3644"\w*.

\w The|strong="H2962"\w* righteous \w shall|strong="H2416"\w* rejoice \w when|strong="H3644"\w* \w he|strong="H2962"\w* seeth \w the|strong="H2962"\w* vengeance: \w He|strong="H2962"\w* \w shall|strong="H2416"\w* wash his feet \w in|strong="H5518"\w* \w the|strong="H2962"\w* blood \w of|strong="H2416"\w* \w the|strong="H2962"\w* wicked;

\w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* say, Verily there \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* reward \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*: Verily there \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* God \w that|strong="H3588"\w* judgeth \w in|strong="H7364"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth.
